Verses: 1 ammon Puththiraraikkuriththuk Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Isravelukkuk Kumaarar Illaiyo? Avanukku Sudhandharavaali Illaiyo? Avargal Raajaa Kaaththesaththai Sudhandhariththukkondu, Adhin Janam Ivan Pattanangalil Kudiyiruppaanen?

2 aagaiyaal, Idho, Naatkal Varumendru Karththar Sollugiraar, Appozhudhu Ammon Puththirarin Pattanamaagiya Rappaavile Yuththaththin Aarpparippaik Ketkappannuven; Adhu Paazhaana Manmedaagum; Adharkaduththa Oorgalum Akkiniyaal Sutterikkappadum; Aanaalum Isravel Than Dhesaththai Sudhandhariththuk Kondavargalin Dhesaththai Sudhandhariththukkollum Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

3 espone, Alaru; Aayi Paazhaakkappattadhu; Rappaavin Kumaaraththigale, Olamidungal; Rattai Uduththikkondu, Pulambi, Veligalil Sutriththiriyungal; Avargal Raajaa Adhin Aasaariyargalodum Adhin Prabukkalodunkooda Siraippattup Povaan.
4 enakku Virodhamaai Varugiravan Yaar Endru Solli, Un Selvaththai Nambina Seerketta Kumaaraththiye, Nee Pallaththaakkugalaippatrip Perumai Paaraattuvaanen? Un Pallaththaakku Karaindhupogiradhu.

5 idho, Un Sutruppuraththaar Ellaaraalum Unmel Thigilai Varappannuven Endru Senaigalin Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar; Neengal Avaravar Thamtham Mun Irukkum Vazhiye Odath Thuraththappaduveergal; Valasaivaangi Odugiravargalai Serppaar Oruvarumillai.
6 adharkuppinbu Ammon Puththirarudaiya Siraiyiruppaith Thiruppuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
7 edhomaikkuriththu Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal; Themaanile Ini Gnaanamillaiyo? Aalosanai Vivegigalaivittu Azhindhadho? Avargaludaiya Gnaanam Kettuppoyitro?
8 thedhaanin Kudigale, Odungal, Mudhugaik Kaattungal, Pallangalil Padhungungal; Esaavai Visaarikkunkaalaththil Avan Aabaththai Avan Mel Varappannuven.

9 dhraatchappazhangalai Arukkiravargal Unnidaththile Vandhaargalaagil, Pinparikkiradharkuk Konjam Vaiyaargalo? Raaththiriyil Thirudar Vandhaargalaagil, Thangalukkup Podhumengiramattum Kollaiyadippaargal Allavo?

10 naano Esaavai Verumaiyaakki Avan Oliththukkollak Koodaadhapadikku Avanudaiya Maraividangalai Velippaduththippoduven; Avanudaiya Sandhadhiyaarum Avanudaiya Sagodhararum Avanudaiya Ayalaarum Azhikkappaduvaargal; Avan Ini Raan.
11 thikkatravargalaaippogum Un Pillaigalai Oppuvi, Naan Avargalai Uyirode Kaappaatruven; Un Vidhavaigal Ennai Nambuvaargalaaga.

12 karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal; Idho, Paaththiraththil Kudikkavendumengira Nyaayaththeerppukku Ullaayiraadhavargal Adhil Kudiththaargal; Nee Kutramatru Neengalaayiruppaayo? Nee Neengalaayiraamal Adhil Nichchayamaaik Kudippaai.
13 posraa Paazhum Nindhaiyum Avaandharamum Saabamumaaga Irukkumendrum, Adhin Pattanangal Ellaam Niththiya Vanaandharangalaayirukkumendrum Ennaikkondu Aanaiyitten Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
14 neengal Koodikkondu, Adharku Virodhamaaga Vandhu, Yuththampannugiradharku Ezhumbungal Endru Solla, Jaadhigalidaththil Sthaanaapadhiyai Anuppugira Seydhiyaik Karththaridaththile Kelvippatten.
15 idho, Unnai Jaadhigalukkulle Siriyadhum, Manusharukkulle Asattaipannappattadhumaakkugiren Engiraar.

16 kanmalai Vedippugalil Vaasam Panni, Medugalin Uchchiyaip Pidiththirukkira Unnaal Un Bayangaramum Un Irudhayaththin Agandhaiyum Unnai Mosampokkitru; Nee Kazhugaippol Uyaraththil Un Koottaik Kattinaalum Angeyirundhu Unnai Vizhappannuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
17 appadiye Edhom Paazhaagum; Adhaik Kadandhupogiravan Evanum Adhin Ellaa Vaadhaigalinimiththamum Bramiththu Eesalpoduvaan.
18 sodhomum Gomoraavum Avaigalin Sutruppurangalum Kavizhkkappattadhupola Idhuvum Kavizhkkappadum Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Ange Oru Manupuththiranum Thanguvadhillai.

19 idho, Purandu Odugira Yordhaanidaththilirundhu Singam Varuvadhu Pol Balavaanudaiya Thaabaraththukku Virodhamaaga Varugiraan; Avanai Sadidhiyile Angeyirundhu Odivarappannuven; Naan Adharku Virodhamaaik Kattalaiyittu Anuppath Therindhukollappattavan Yaar? Enakku Samaanamaanavan Yaar? Enakku Mattukkattugiravan Yaar? Enakku Munbaaga Nilainirkappogira Meyppan Yaar?

20 aagaiyaal Karththar Edhomukku Virodhamaaga Yosiththa Aalosanaiyaiyum, Avar Themaanin Kudigalukku Virodhamaaga Ninaiththirukkira Ninaivugalaiyum Kelungal; Mandhaiyil Siriyavargal Meyyaagave Avargalaip Pidiththizhuppaargal, Avargal Irukkira Thaabarangalai Avar Meyyaagave Paazhaakkuvaar.
21 avaigalukkul Idindhuvizhum Saththaththinaale Boomi Adhirum; Kookkuralin Saththam Sivandha Samuththiramattum Ketkappadum.

22 idho, Oru Kazhugaippola Ezhumbi, Parandhuvandhu, Than Settaigalaip Posraavinmel Virippaan; Annaalile Edhomudaiya Paraakramasaaligalin Irudhayam Prasavavedhanaippadugira Sthreeyin Irudhayampola Irukkum Engiraar.

23 thamaskuvaik Kuriththu Solvadhu; Aamaaththum Arppaaththum Kalangugiradhu; Pollaadha Seydhiyai Avargal Kettapadiyinaal Karaindhu Pogiraargal; Samuththiraththoramaai Sanjalamundu; Adharku Amaidhalillai.
24 thamasku Thalarndhupom, Purankaatti Odippom; Thigil Adhaippidiththadhu; Prasava Sthreeyaippola Idukkamum Vedhanaigalum Adhaip Pidiththadhu.
25 sandhoshamaana En Ooraagiya Andhap Pugazhchchiyulla Nagaram Thappa Vidappadaamarpoyitre!
26 aadhalaal Adhin Vaalibar Adhin Veedhigalil Vizhundhu, Yuththamanushar Ellaarum Annaalile Sangaaramaavaargal Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.
27 thamaskuvin Madhilgalil Theekkoluththuven; Adhu Penaadhaaththin Aramanaigalaip Patchikkum Engiraar.

28 baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Muriyadikkum Kedhaaraiyum Kaadhsorudaiya Raajyangalaiyum Kuriththuk Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Ezhumbi, Kedhaarukku Virodhamaagap Poi, Keezhththisaippuththiraraip Paazhaakkungal.

29 avargaludaiya Koodaarangalaiyum Avargaludaiya Mandhaigalaiyum Vaangi, Avargaludaiya Thiraigalaiyum Avargaludaiya Ellaath Thattumuttugalaiyum Avargaludaiya Ottagangalaiyum Thangalukkendru Kondupoi, Eththisaiyum Bayam Endru Solli, Avargalmel Aarpparippaargal.

30 kaadhsorin Kudigale, Odi Dhooraththil Alaiyungal; Pallaththil Odhungip Padhungungal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Ungalukku Virodhamaaga Aalosanaiseydhu, Ungalukku Virodhamaaga Ubaayangalai Sindhiththirukkiraan.
31 anjaamal Nirvisaaramaaik Kudiyirukkira Jaadhikku Virodhamaaga Ezhumbippongal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar. Adharku Vaasalgalumillai, Thaazhpaalgalumillai; Avargal Thanippadath Thangiyirukkiraargal.

32 avargaludaiya Ottagangal Kollaiyum, Avargaludaiya Aadu Maadugalin Eraalam Sooraiyumaagum; Naan Avargalai Sagala Thisaigalumaana Kadaiyaandhara Moolaigalil Irukkiravargalidaththukku Sidharadiththuvittu, Adhinudaiya Sagala Pakkangalilumirundhu Avargalukku Aabaththai Varappannuven Endru Karththarsollugiraar.
33 aaththor Valusarppangalin Thaabaramaagi, Endrendraikkum Paazhaaikkidakkum; Oruvanum Ange Kudiyiruppadhillai, Oru Manupuththiranum Adhile, Thanguvadhumillaiyengiraar.
34 yoodhaa Raajaavaagiya Sidhekkiyaavinudaiya Raajyabaaraththin Thuvakkaththile, Elaamukku Virodhamaaga Eremiyaa Ennum Theerkkadharisikku Undaana Karththarudaiyavasanam:
35 senaigalin Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Idho, Naan Elaamin Villennum Avargaludaiya Pradhaana Vallamaiyai Muriththuppottu,

36 vaanaththin Naalu Thisaigalilumirundhu Naalu Kaatrugalai Elaamin Mel Varappanni, Avargalai Indha Ellaath Thisaigalilum Sidharadippen; Elaam Dhesaththilirundhu Thuraththundavargal Sagala Jaadhigalilum Sidharappaduvaargal.

37 naan Elaamiyarai Avargal Saththurukkalukku Munbaagavum, Avargal Praananai Vaangath Thedugiravargalukku Munbaagavum Kalangappanni, En Kobaththin Ukkiramaagiya Theengai Avargalmel Varappannuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Naan Avargalai Nirmoolamaakkumattum Pattayaththai Avargalukkup Pinnaaga Anuppi,
38 en Singaasanaththai Elaamile Vaiththu, Angeyirundhu Raajaavaiyum Prabukkalaiyum Azhiththuppoduven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
39 aanaalum Kadaisinaatkalile Naan Elaamin Siraiyiruppaith Thiruppuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
